dmca.title: SilverSource Copyright Infringement Complaint Against  Dhanish
dmca.body:
SilverSource.com
Google, Inc.	
February 3, 2005 
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT

We are writing to make you aware of theft of our copyrighted site materials, and to request that you remove or disable access to these stolen materials in compliance with the Digital Milennium Copyright Act.

The copyrighted work at issue is the text which appears via Search Query: "dhanish.com carefully selects"
Infringing Web Page: http://www.dhanish.com/about.htm

Our original copyrighted text can be found on: http://wwww.silversource.com/

Dhanish.com initially copied the entire text of our home page verbatim, and included the same on its own website in an attempt to outrank SilverSource on Google search results. Dhanish's copying was so blatant that it failed to delete the SilverSource mark from that text (for comparison purposes, attached herewith please find a December 1, 2004 printout from the Dhanish.com website). In response to letters sent from our attorneys, Dhanish has continued to retain all of the stolen text in its entirety, but has now merely substituted all instances of the SilverSource brand name with its own.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

This is the best available owner/administrator contact information we have for Dhanish.com, according to its WHOIS registration:

[Private] 
[Private]
Bangkok 10100 Thailand

We would greatly appreciate your early attention to this matter. Please consider me personally at your service if I may provide you any further assistance or information whatsoever. Thank you for your time.


Yours Sincerely,
[Private]
SilverSource.com
eM [Private]
[Private]
Santa Monica, CA 90403-5784 
USA Tel [Private]
